item.title: Well-Architected Framework for EKS - Best Practices and Solutions
item.description: According to CNCF 2019 survey, more than 84% of respondents are using containers in production, and more than 78% respondents are using Kubernetes in Production. We also know that, 84% of all kubernetes workloads in public cloud run on AWS. With the commercial launch of Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service...
